ovdesc.p: The application will store unit accruals and yield on a daily basis for all interest bearing securities. A record will be maintained for every interest payment cycle of the security. Any back dated price or interest rate change, done after the first recording, will be considered.

desc.p: ID of the SC.SEC.TIME.SERIES record. A record will be maintained for every interest payment cycle of the security.
The ID for this application will be in the following format (SecurityNo.InterestPaymentDate).
The security ( a bond-type instrument from SECURITY MASTER) for which the unit accrual and yield is calculated.
The currency of the security mentioned in the previous field.
The issue date of the security.
This field will holds the accrual start date of the security.
This field will hold the interest payment date of the security.
The maturity date of the bond is stored in this field.
The field will hold the day basis that should be considered for calculating the accrued interest and yield.
The field stores the working day for which the accrued interest and yield is calculated. The fields from BUSINESS.DATE to YIELD are associated multi values.
The field will hold the price of the security for the corresponding BUSINESS.DATE. The fields from BUSINESS.DATE to YIELD are associated multi values.
The field will hold the interest of the security for the corresponding BUSINESS.DATE. The fields from BUSINESS.DATE to YIELD are associated multi values.
The field will hold the accrued interest for one nominal (Unit Accrual) from the accrual start date to BUSINESS.DATE. The fields from BUSINESS.DATE to YIELD are associated multi values.
This field will hold the yield on the corresponding BUSINESS.DATE. The fields from BUSINESS.DATE to YIELD are associated multi values.
